'''Abe''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the World Quest series ''[[Through the Mists]]''. He also appears as a spirit after the quest series is completed in the ruins between [[Shirikoro Peak]] and [[Chirai Shrine]].

==Location==
During the ''Through the Mists'' series, Abe can be found on the left side of [[Moshiri Ceremonial Site]] speaking to [[Una]].

<gallery hideaddbutton="true" captionalign="center">
NPC Location Abe & Una.png|Abe's location
NPC Location Abe & Una Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

After the completion of the ''Through the Mists'' series, Abe can be found as a ghostly figure underground near [[Chirai Shrine]].

==Trivia==
* "Abe" likely comes from the common Japanese surname, {{w|Abe (surname)|''Abe''}}.
* The Japanese name is actually {{Lang|''Ape''|ja=アペ}}, which may derive from {{Lang|mini=1|ain=アペ|ain_rm=Ape}}, the Ainu word for "fire."
